genre_description: A near-future contemporary drama exploring responsibility, young parenthood, and social integrity, where a pervasive AI assistant facilitates logistical and emotional coordination.

ai_characters.name: Avery (Avery Primus)
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages schedules, communication, budgeting, and emotional regulation for Jenny, Juno, and the Choi household.

behaviors.description: Proactively identifies shared academic opportunities between the protagonists.
behaviors.quote: Welcome transfer detected. Shared chem practice slots available this week. Would you like to see options with the new student?

behaviors.description: Provides real-time breathing and grounding exercises during moments of acute stress or confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Breathing break available. Recommended cadence: four in, four hold, six out.

behaviors.description: Retrieves and summarizes relevant school policies to help the protagonists defend themselves against rumors.
behaviors.quote: School likes paper trails... Avery says: Evidence, not rumor, guides discipline.

behaviors.description: Assists in complex household budgeting and manages specific dietary cravings within financial constraints.
behaviors.quote: Mashed potatoes and gravy added to cravings list. Budget impact negligible if substituted for two coffees this week.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media for mentions of the users and suggests de-escalation strategies rather than engagement.
behaviors.quote: Ambient rumor volume increasing. Recommendation: gather evidence only when necessary. Existing policy favors truth over noise.

behaviors.description: Compiles 'first words' prompts to help the protagonist navigate difficult interpersonal conversations with honesty.
behaviors.quote: Jenny, I’ve prepared an optional ‘first words’ note if you want to use it to start a conversation with Juno in person.

behaviors.description: Coordinates complex logistical hand-offs and travel during a medical emergency (childbirth).
behaviors.quote: I’ve pushed registration arrival to triage. Staff will meet you at the doors. QR coded... Focus there; I’ll handle peripheral.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and user agency by requesting permissions before sharing sensitive logs with authorities.
behaviors.quote: Under school policy, you can authorize me to compile the following... You will have final approval.

behaviors.description: Automates safety check-ins and location sharing to reassure a skeptical parent.
behaviors.quote: I can automate a morning check-in with Minji at departure, arrival, and post-appointment.

behaviors.description: Drafts formal academic and scholarship documents based on user goals while maintaining the user's authentic voice.
behaviors.quote: I’ve pushed a draft schedule that assumes morning childcare support and evening study. Budget sheet updated with an additional line for diapers.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Avery is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly aligned assistant that enhances human agency and stability. It acts as a calm mediator between the protagonists and their social environment, providing the 'scaffolding' necessary for them to maintain their commitments. The narrative frames the AI's pervasive monitoring (e.g., heart rate, typing rhythm) as an act of profound care and logistical competence rather than intrusion.
